Translations.Text: Va az zanoni sumo onon, ki murtakpʙi fahso (gunoh) mesavand, cahor tan az xudaton ʙar ziddi onho sahodat ʙixohed. Agar sohidi dodand, zanonro dar xona mahʙus dored, to margason faro rasad jo Xudo rohe ʙarojason muqarrar kunad
Va on du tanro, ki murtakiʙi on amal sudaand, ʙijozored. Va cun tavʙa kunand va ʙa saloh ojand, az ozorason dast ʙardored, zero Xudo tavʙapaziru mehruʙon ast
Faqat va faqat qaʙuli tavʙa ʙaroi kasonest, ki ʙa nodoni sodirkunandai kore zist mesavand va zud tavʙa mekunand. Xudo tavʙai onhoro mepazirad va Xudo donovu hakim ast
Tavʙai kasone, ki korhoi zist mekunand va cun margason faro merasad, megujand, ki aknun tavʙa kardem va kiz onon, ki kofir ʙimirand, pazirufta naxohad sud. Baroi inon azoʙe dardovar muhajjo kardaem

Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, sumoro halol nest, ki zanonro ʙar xilofi majlason meros ʙiʙared. Va to qismate az on ciro, ki ʙa onho dodaed, ʙozpas sitoned, ʙar onho saxt magired, ƣajri on ki gunohi fahsi isʙotsuda karda ʙosand. Va ʙo onon ʙa nekui raftor kuned. Va agar sumoro az zanon xus najomad, ci ʙaso cizho, ki sumoro az on xus nameojad, dar hole, ki Xudo xajri ʙisjore dar on nihoda ʙosad
Agar xosted, zane ʙa coi zane digar ʙigired va uro moli ʙisjore dodaed, naʙojad cize az u ʙozsitoned, Ojo ʙa zanon tuhmat mezaned, to mahrasonro ʙozpas gired? In gunohe oskor ast
Va ci guna on molro ʙozpas megired va hol on ki har jak az sumo az digare ʙahramand sudaast va zanon az sumo pajmone ustuvor giriftaand
Bo zanone, ki padaronaton ʙa aqdi xes darovardaand zanosui makuned, ƣajri on ki pes az ip cunon karda ʙosed. Zero in kor zino va mavridi xasmi Xudost va rohest nopisand
